unnormalised: Barobar asa, tumi Bhartantlean bhonvddechi iozonn kortat kai? Khub borem! Punn Indian Airways-achim margdarshan thodem... borem, ami fokot "ruchik" mhonnun sangtat. Hanv gharantlean kitlea fauttim bhonvlam tem hanv mellunk xokona (gambhirponnan, mhojea provas ezentak vicharat!), ani hanv thoddeo vostu xikla. Mhojea koddlean mellil'lem kotthinai-jivit ginean vanttunk hanv thoddo, khas korun tumi poile fautt asat zalear. Tuka tachi "Indian Airways Jivem Urtol'li Pustok" mhonnun vichar kor.
normalised: Khoi, tumi Bhartantlean bhonvddecho iojon kortat, khorench? Bhari! Punn Indian Airwaysachea sonvsarantlean vatt kaddop thoddem... mhunnge, ami fokot “ruchik” mhunnchea. Hanvem gharelu ud'dannam itlea pauttim keleant ki hanv tankanchi genn'tti korunuch zaina (khorench, mhojea bhonvddi ejentak vichara!), ani vattent hanvem kaim vostu xikleat. Vichar kelo ki hanv mhojea kastan zoddlelem ginean vanttun gheum, khas korun zannim poileach fautt ud'danantlean bhonvddek vochpak asat tankam. Hacho tujo “Indian Airways Survival Guide” mhunn vichar kara.

unnormalised: Poili vostu: booking. Hanv sadharanponnan MakeMyTrip vo Yatra.com jevnancher kimot tankta. Indigo, SpiceJet, Air India, ani Vistara (tankam mell'lea, BTW, 01/01/2024-antlean probhavi, mhaka lagta). Deal-ancher nodor dovrat, khas korun off-season-ant. Airlines-ak sadharanponnan flash sales astali, punn tim airport suraksha-ant mhojea dhirye-portun veginuch nexht zatali. Pro-tip: 45 disam adim booking kelear tankam sobhit fares mellttat.
normalised: Poileo vostu poileoch: booking. Hanv sadharanponnan MakeMyTrip vo Yatra dot com sarkhea siteancher kimoti tankta. Tuka Indigo, SpiceJet, Air India, ani Vistara kad'dhyo disteol (tim ek zaleant, B-T-W, ponchvis janueri don hozar ponchvis savn, mhaka dista). Offersancher doxo theva, khas korun off-seasonant. Airlinesancher sadharanponnan flash sales astat, punn tim airport securitycher mhoji dorya tuttat tednna fattim urtat. Pro-tip: booking chalis ani ponch dis adim tumka bore ddham melltta.

unnormalised: Atam, tea fares-anche vixoyant... Poilim poddlolea unch kimotecher bhulonat. Tem Rs. 10-ak vada pav polleunk toxem, ani tumi chutney-ak adhik diunk zai mhonnun tumi vollkhotat. Airlines-ak charges vaddounk khub avoddta. Baggage ek vhoddloch. Indigo chodd lagun Rs. 400 adhik gheuncho zata tumi check-in limit-achi 15 kg-achi unchtai vattoita zalear. Ani jevonn? Gourmet dining-acho vichar soddun di. Thoddi bhaxnnam bhartun di – hea vixoyant mhojeacher visvas dovrat. Tumi Vistara-ntlean bhonvddi korunche zata zalear, ji thodi bori vata, punn premiuma-cher.
normalised: Atam, tea ddhamanche vixexim... Poilechim komi kimotir thako naka. Tem eka vada pavachero rupia dhaa rupiank astani zatlem ani tumka chutneyk odhik rupia divche poddttele. Airlinesank odhik chorge launk bore lagtat. Baggage ek vhoddli vostu asa. Indigo pondhra kilogram check-in limitik fattlavo zatlem zalear rupia charxi rupia odhik gheta. Ani jevonn? Gourmet dining vixexim visrun vocha. Thun thoddem khann ghalun ghe – mhajer visvas theva. Tum Vistarantlean ud'dann korinasir, tem thoddem borem khann dita, punn odhik mulak.

unnormalised: Baggage-ache vixoyant sangta, check-in counters-ancher thoddho ghondollacho sobhavan dhorun cholat. Queues lamb astali, khas korun 6:00 AM vo Diwali utsovam vellar. Ani tachi weigh korunk melltta. Tim khub ghott zatali! Ek kilogram voiler tankam kharch korunk xokta. Hanvem eka zannank apunnacho sobh kholun kaddlo, apunnacho vajan vaddounk vavurto. To... ek dekhnni aslo. To zo kholun kaddunk vavurta tancho sobhavant dhorun cholonat. Ek luggage scale-ant invest korat (tim Amazon-cher Rs. 500-chea bhaxonancher).
normalised: Baggage vixexim uloitana, check-in counterancher thoddea dhondyambhond'dhiponnak toyar rau. Dhoni lamb astat, khas korun ut'tejonachea vellak zoxe sokallche saa vaje vo Diwalichea suttenchea vellak. Ani magir vojn korpachem asta. Te bara khat'tor astat! Ek kilo voilean zatat zalear tumka poddttole. Hanvem ek pautt eka monxak aplem purtem suitkes counterache utratani fattim uddoitaun vojn punn-vanttun korop dekhlem. Tem... ek dekhnnem asllem. Tum to monis zaunko naka. Ek luggage scale ghe (tem Amazonacher rupia panchxich rupiank melltta).

unnormalised: Suraksha-i anik ek sobhav. Yaad dovrat, konnachea-i power banks 20,000 mAh-acher na tumchea check-in baggage-ant. Tem tuka tumchea jutte, belt ani konnachea-i electronic devices kaddunk magta. Drill bore bore asat, punn lines-ak poddttant tumi vochotant. Fuddem dhyan di ani tea chayecher yaad dovrat.
normalised: Security ek anik addventurer asa. Mhonn dhori, tumchea checked baggageant ponchvis hozar M-A-H voilean power banks noko. Toxench, te tumka tumchi zobli, pottto ani khoinchei electronic vostu kaddunk sangtele. Drill barebhaxen standart asa, punn dhoni bhorvso na tumka. Fokot sas ghe ani dusrea koneak chai mhonn dhori.

unnormalised: Tumi plane-ant ailear, barobar... tem ek gharantlian flight. Emirates-achi boreakai-chi umed dovrunkonach. Legroom sadharanponnan thoddi chodd astali (khas korun tumi 6 ft. mhojea bhai-toxem asat zalear), ani in-flight entertainment-ak thoddo unno asta. Thoddea films vo podcasts poilim download korat. Noise-canceling headphones-ak jivont aspaunk uloitat. Ani ho, ulpaunam sadharanponnan Hindi, English, ani uprant thoddi pradeshik bhaxonam asat.
normalised: Tum plennacher poddttoch, mhunnge... tem gharelu ud'dann asa. Emiratesachea bhogtache poddunk tumi poddchem na. Paiank odhik zago komi asta (khas korun tumcho bhav saa futt asa zalear), ani ud'dannant tumcho monoronn komi asta. Adimuch thodde filma vo podcast download kara. Noise-canceling headphones tumka jiv ditole. Ani hoi, ghoxnna sadharanponnan Hindi, English, ani magir khoinchei pradexik bhaxeant kortat.

unnormalised: Xevttak, yenvop. Plane-antlean bhair yetol'li sadharanponnan vegantli vato asta. Tumchea baggage-antlean dhondo ghevnk? Tichea vellar dhire-achi khori poriksha suru zata. Tim 15 mins-antlean 45 mins-ant bags dixtti podduncho zata. Ani sadharanponnan tumchi suitcase harounk poddttoli mhonnun tumi tonddi polleun koddto zauncho to vellar zaunk xokta. Punn hacho orth asa, Indian flying-achem dhire-achi bhag, barem na? Fokot xant ravon, dhorun cholat ani tumchea porot flight-ak prepone korat, tumi prepone keli tem chuki na. Khuxal provas!
normalised: Xevttim, utronn. Plennak fattim zata astanam sadharanponnan bara utratachem asta. Tumchea baggageacher davyo korunko? To doryachi xevattichi kasoti suru zata. Teank pondhra minutanchean char ponchvis minutam lagtat baggageacher dixtti poddunk. Ani sodeank tumchi suitcase harovloli asa mhonn tumka bhirant dista. Punn khoi, tem Bhartantle ud'danacho onubhav asa, barebhaxen? Fokot shant rau, choltachi zanniv theva, ani tumchem portichem ud'dann adim korun ghe, tumchea adim keli ud'dichi taryokh tumi harouna naka mhunn. Subh yatra!
